name: José Angel Araguz
bio: José Angel Araguz is the author of the poetry collections Everything We Think We Hear (Floricanto Press, 2015) and Small Fires (FutureCycle Press, 2017), as well as seven chapbooks. His poems, prose, and reviews have appeared in Crab Creek Review, Prairie Schooner, The Windward Review, and The Bind. A CantoMundo fellow, Araguz runs the poetry blog The Friday Influence and teaches English and creative writing at Linfield College.
